title: Mukesh Ambani
summary: Mukesh Dhirubhai Ambani (born 19 April 1957) is an Indian billionaire businessman, and the chairman, managing director, and largest shareholder of Reliance Industries Ltd. (RIL), a Fortune Global 500 company and India's most valuable company by market value.[4] According to Forbes, he is the richest person in Asia with a net worth of US$100.2B billion[5] and the 11th richest person in the world, as of 2nd of December 2021.
